short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the default new-tab-page with one with tree-structured bookmarks and pretty pictures.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple new tab page replacer for Google Chrome

Features:

Lists bookmarks in a searchable tree structure
Lists your top-visited sites
Live clock with your system's time
Random scenic background (images are all under the cc0 license and come from https://www.pexels.com/)
